column4: Tourism; Svay Rieng province: On the morning of Wednesday March 18
column5: the Bavet International Border Gate and other border posts on the Vietnamese side of the Cambodian border were temporarily closed.------If any (*non-Viet?) nationals enter Vietnam
column6: they will be quarantined for 14 days to prevent the spread of Covid-19.------It is not clear on how long these closures will be enforced. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP------*Note that Cambodia relies on Vietnam for much of its produce
